query: query GetTerms($data: TermInput!) { getTerms(data: $data) { terms { id name courseGroups { id name courses { __typename ... on StudioCourse { id name description subtitle price originalPrice currentPrice depositPrice thumbImage image imagePosition { X Y } order active displayStatus danceType level attendanceTypes ageFrom ageTo fullyBooked location startDateTime endDateTime hasTasterClasses tasterPrice isAcceptingDeposits } ... on OnlineCourse { id name description subtitle price originalPrice currentPrice depositPrice thumbImage image imagePosition { X Y } order active displayStatus danceType level attendanceTypes ageFrom ageTo fullyBooked location startDateTime endDateTime hasTasterClasses tasterPrice isAcceptingDeposits } } } } } }
